title: More UCL Drama for PSG
description:
The FC crew react to PSG falling to 2nd place in their UCL group after Benfica pull off a massive win and discuss PSG and Liverpool's difficult path forward to advance past the Round of 16. Plus, Gab Marcotti gives his dream UCL Round of 16 draw and makes his predictions as to who will win the FIFA World Cup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: PSG drop to 2nd in their UCL group; PSG and Liverpool's difficult UCL path forward; UCL Dream draw;  World Cup predictions
